comment: Grades fairly, nothing is really hard. Projects are all fairly easy, the hardest part is coming up with an idea. She gives a lot of room for creativity and to do things you find interesting. You will get useful critiques after every project. definitely a good professor to take to make this class easier.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: This is an easy class if you put the work in. Quizzes can use the powerpoint she gives. Projects are not too hard, and are very open ended so you can do what you want based on a prompt. Digital mediums are allowed.

I had Professor Lassiter for Concepts to Creativity. Honestly one of my favorite professors! Very chill and understanding teacher. Classes were fun. There was lots of talking and laughing throughout the semester. Very welcoming space for growth and experimentation. You have to take her if you can!

Her lessons will help you improve in general, but I do wish she had given detailed feedback tailored to my work for her class. I only got "nice work," and a grade. I wanted more "___ is a consistent issue, and you can fix it by __." 

BUT! She's fun and understanding with absences. It's easy to get an A if you just put effort in your assignments.

She is so funny and loves to interact with her students! We only had one or two open note quizzes and the rest of the grades are projects + a final project. Please take her!! I wish I could take her for another class but my schedule clashed :(. She is the best art professor I've had yet!
A few hw assignments, 4 major projects. Very accommodating and understanding!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things
